SkinPreparation: The skin was shaved, abrased and cleansed with 70 percent ethyl alcohol
EMGPlacementSchemeDescription: (i) Surface electrodes: One grid was carefully positioned on the muscle belly of the right tibialis anterior (identified through palpation). (ii) Invasive EMG: A guiding filament inserted into a 25-gauge needle was used to place the thin-film structure in the muscle. Afterwards, the needle is withdrawn, leaving only the thin-film array within the muscle. Two bands damped with water were placed around the ankle as ground (R2) and reference (R1) electrodes.
TaskDescription: The participant performed a trapezoidal contractions at 20 percent MVC (10 seconds ramp up; 60 seconds hold; 10 seconds ramp down).
